transcript:
Customer: Hello, IndiaMART bol rahe ho na?
Helllo?
Customer: Haan, good evening sir, main aapse bol raha tha IndiaMART se.
Executive: Achcha kya mujhe aajkal kaun hai hamare usme?
Customer: Pehle toh Rashmi ji kaun tha?
Executive: Sakshi ji, Sakshi ji, woh aajkal leave par hai na, main unka business manager baat kar raha hu sir.
Customer: Achcha mujhko na 3 point lock panel ka jo manufacturer hai trader se nahi usko list chahiye tha.
Executive: 3 point lock.
Customer: 3 point panel lock.
Customer: 3 point lock.
Customer: In panel.
Customer: Manufacturer.
Customer: Not trader.
Executive: Sir woh toh dekho.
Executive: Main sir aapki requirement post kar deta hu sir, manufacturer bhi waha likhunga lekin kabhi kabhi sir aisa hota hai ki jo woh jo hote hai na supplier woh log bhi call kar lete hai sir waha par lekin agar aap yeh aisa aise koi particular sir hum log filter karke aapko list nahi de sakte ki bhai yeh log yaani ki yeh hai aap inse baat kar sakte ho kyunki woh requirement aapki post kari jayegi sir waha par.
Customer: Chalo aap bhej do, bhej do aap bhej do.
Executive: Post karo. Aap call pe rahiye sir main aapko batata hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs manufacturer list for 3-point lock panel.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to post the requirement.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will post the requirement.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, manufacturer, list, requirement
